name: Kraken's Card Adventure
description:
My first game jam and my second project ever in game dev. I'm happy I got to something that you can play from begining to the end. Will you find a way to beat the kraken ?
You'll quickly see that I'm no artist don't get scared buy the game art !

I'd be verry happy to know what you think of it ! Tell me what you thought of the game on Twitter !

I also have a YouTube Channel where I have video about making the game...
Come have a look !

I've used sound from freesound.org and OpenGameArt.org that were under the CC0 creative commons license. Everything else as you probably can see was made by my wonderful photoshop skills !
